name: The Lone Soldier
description:
The Lone Soldier is a first person shooter that takes places in a fortress/town that has been taken over by insurgents.

You are tasked with taking out the insurgent leader.

You are alone out there so do your best!

The game was made in Gameguru.

This game was made for a contest. After it was over we decided to post it here.

It contains voice acting from one of the developers.
